headline: Ask HN: What Happened to Competition in Travel?
description:
Recently I was looking to book a rental car for a family trip. I was looking for a larger vehicle (6+ passengers) so we could take one car. Minivans are completely unavailable and even with high gas prices SUVs are running $200+/day. I searched the usual travel aggregator sites (Expedia, Kayak, Priceline) and prices were identical. The only interesting alternative that came up was Turo.

Does anyone have any suggestions for finding rental cars?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 旅游业的竞争发生了什么？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 旅遊業的競爭發生了什麼？
description_zh-Hans:
最近，我想为一次家庭旅行预订一辆租车。我想找一辆大一点的车（6人以上），这样我们可以带一辆车。小型货车完全不能用，即使是高油价，SUV也要200美元以上/天。我搜索了通常的旅游聚合网站（Expedia、Kayak、Priceline），价格都是一样的。唯一有趣的选择是Turo。

有谁对寻找租车有什么建议吗？
description_zh-Hant:
最近，我想為一次家庭旅行預訂一輛租車。我想找一輛大一點的車（6人以上），這樣我們可以帶一輛車。小型貨車完全不能用，即使是高油價，SUV也要200美元以上/天。我搜索了通常的旅遊聚合網站（Expedia、Kayak、Priceline），價格都是一樣的。唯一有趣的選擇是Turo。

有誰對尋找租車有什麼建議嗎？
